verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah and you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- Also thou son אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man הִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> hin-na-Ve prophesy אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָרֵ֣י <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rei unto the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <S%H559><s%> ve-'A-mar-ta, and say הָרֵי֙ <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rei Ye mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- the word יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an Because אָמַ֧ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar hath said הָאוֹיֵ֛ב <S%H341><s%> ha-'o-Yev Because the enemy עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem against הֶאָ֑ח <S%H1889><s%> he-'Ach; against you Aha וּבָמ֣וֹת <S%H1116><s%> u-va-Mot high places עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam, even the ancient לְמֽוֹרָשָׁ֖ה <S%H4181><s%> le-mo-ra-Shah are ours in possession הָ֥יְתָה <S%H1961><s%> Ha-ye-tah have become לָּֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen therefore הִנָּבֵ֣א <S%H5012><s%> hin-na-Ve Therefore prophesy וְאָמַרְתָּ֔ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta, and say כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an reason בְּיַ֡עַן <S%H3282><s%> be-Ya-'an reason שַׁמּוֹת֩ <S%H8074><s%> sham-mOt Because they have made [you] desolate וְשָׁאֹ֨ף <S%H7602><s%> ve-sha-'Of and swallowed you up אֶתְכֶ֜ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem מִסָּבִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> mis-sa-Viv, on every side לִֽהְיוֹתְכֶ֤ם <S%H1961><s%> lih-yot-Chem become מֽוֹרָשָׁה֙ <S%H4181><s%> mo-ra-Shah that ye might be a possession לִשְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> lish-'e-Rit unto the residue הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim, of the heathen וַתֵּֽעֲל֛וּ <S%H5927><s%> vat-te-'a-Lu and ye are taken up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in שְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> se-Fat in the lips לָשׁ֖וֹן <S%H3956><s%> la-Shon of talkers וְדִבַּת־ <S%H1681><s%> ve-dib-bat- and [are] an infamy עָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> 'Am. of the people

לָכֵן֙ <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore הָרֵ֣י <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rei Therefore ye mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel שִׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U hear דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- the word אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai of the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; GOD כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְ֠הוִה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh GOD לֶהָרִ֨ים <S%H2022><s%> le-ha-Rim to the mountains וְלַגְּבָע֜וֹת <S%H1389><s%> ve-lag-ge-va-'ot and to the hills לָאֲפִיקִ֣ים <S%H650><s%> la-'a-fi-Kim to the rivers וְלַגֵּאָי֗וֹת <S%H1516><s%> ve-lag-ge-'a-Yot, and to the valleys וְלֶחֳרָב֤וֹת <S%H2723><s%> ve-le-cho-ra-Vot wastes הַשֹּֽׁמְמוֹת֙ <S%H8076><s%> hash-sho-me-mOt desolate וְלֶעָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> ve-le-'a-Rim and to the cities הַנֶּעֱזָב֔וֹת <S%H5800><s%> han-ne-'e-za-Vot, that are forsaken אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הָי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu have become לְבַז֙ <S%H957><s%> le-Vaz which became a prey וּלְלַ֔עַג <S%H3933><s%> u-le-La-'ag, and derision לִשְׁאֵרִ֥ית <S%H7611><s%> lish-'e-Rit to the residue הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim of the heathen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> mis-sa-Viv. that [are] round about ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- thus אָמַר֮ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִה֒ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh GOD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo לֹ֠א <S%H3808><s%> lo not בְּאֵ֨שׁ <S%H784><s%> be-'Esh Surely in the fire קִנְאָתִ֥י <S%H7068><s%> kin-'a-Ti of my jealousy דִבַּ֛רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti have I spoken עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against שְׁאֵרִ֥ית <S%H7611><s%> she-'e-Rit against the residue הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim of the heathen וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and against אֱד֣וֹם <S%H123><s%> e-Dom and against all Idumea כֻּלָּ֑א <S%H3605><s%> kul-La; all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who נָתְנֽוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> na-te-nu- which have appointed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַרְצִ֣י׀ <S%H776><s%> 'ar-Tzi my land לָ֠הֶם <S%H1992><s%> La-hem as לְמ֨וֹרָשָׁ֜ה <S%H4181><s%> le-Mo-ra-Shah into their possession בְּשִׂמְחַ֤ת <S%H8057><s%> be-sim-Chat with the joy כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all לֵבָב֙ <S%H3824><s%> le-Vav of all [their] heart בִּשְׁאָ֣ט <S%H7589><s%> bish-'At with despiteful נֶ֔פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh, minds לְמַ֥עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an because of מִגְרָשָׁ֖הּ <S%H4054><s%> mig-ra-Shah to cast it out לָבַֽז׃ <S%H957><s%> la-Vaz. for a prey

לָכֵ֕ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen Therefore הִנָּבֵ֖א <S%H5012><s%> hin-na-Ve Prophesy עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning אַדְמַ֣ת <S%H127><s%> 'ad-Mat therefore concerning the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֡ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say לֶהָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> le-ha-Rim unto the mountains וְ֠לַגְּבָעוֹת <S%H1389><s%> Ve-lag-ge-va-'ot and to the hills לָאֲפִיקִ֨ים <S%H650><s%> la-'a-fi-Kim to the rivers וְלַגֵּאָי֜וֹת <S%H1516><s%> ve-lag-ge-'a-Yot and to the valleys כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold בְקִנְאָתִ֤י <S%H7068><s%> ve-kin-'a-Ti in my jealousy וּבַחֲמָתִי֙ <S%H2534><s%> u-va-cha-ma-Ti and in my fury דִּבַּ֔רְתִּי <S%H1696><s%> dib-Bar-ti, Behold I have spoken יַ֛עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an because כְּלִמַּ֥ת <S%H3639><s%> ke-lim-Mat the shame גּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim of the heathen נְשָׂאתֶֽם׃ <S%H5375><s%> ne-sa-Tem. because ye have borne

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I נָשָׂ֣אתִי <S%H5375><s%> na-Sa-ti I have lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יָדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di; mine hand אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo not הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim Surely the heathen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לָכֶ֣ם la-Chem מִסָּבִ֔יב <S%H5439><s%> mis-sa-Viv, that [are] about הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah will themselves כְּלִמָּתָ֥ם <S%H3639><s%> ke-lim-ma-Tam their shame יִשָּֽׂאוּ׃ <S%H5375><s%> yis-Sa-'u. you they shall bear

וְאַתֶּ֞ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem O הָרֵ֤י <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rei But ye O mountains יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel עַנְפְּכֶ֣ם <S%H6057><s%> 'an-pe-Chem your branches תִּתֵּ֔נוּ <S%H5414><s%> tit-Te-nu, ye shall shoot forth וּפֶרְיְכֶ֥ם <S%H6529><s%> u-fer-ye-Chem your fruit תִּשְׂא֖וּ <S%H5375><s%> tis-'U and yield לְעַמִּ֣י <S%H5971><s%> le-'am-Mi to my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for קֵרְב֖וּ <S%H7126><s%> ke-re-Vu for they are at hand לָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> la-Vo. to come

כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki for הִנְנִ֣י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold אֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem; about וּפָנִ֣יתִי <S%H6437><s%> u-fa-Ni-ti For behold I [am] for you and I will turn אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem, to you וְנֶעֱבַדְתֶּ֖ם <S%H5647><s%> ve-ne-'e-vad-Tem unto you and ye shall be tilled וְנִזְרַעְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H2232><s%> ve-niz-ra'-Tem. and sown

וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֤י <S%H7235><s%> ve-hir-bei-Ti And I will multiply עֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem and אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, men כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit upon you all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel כֻּלֹּ֑ה <S%H3605><s%> kul-Loh; all וְנֹֽשְׁבוּ֙ <S%H3427><s%> ve-no-she-Vu shall be inhabited הֶֽעָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> he-'a-Rim, [even] all of it and the cities וְהֶחֳרָב֖וֹת <S%H2723><s%> ve-he-cho-ra-Vot and the wastes תִּבָּנֶֽינָה׃ <S%H1129><s%> tib-ba-Nei-nah. shall be builded

וְהִרְבֵּיתִ֧י <S%H7235><s%> ve-hir-bei-Ti And I will multiply עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem on אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam upon you man וּבְהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> u-ve-he-Mah and beast וְרָב֣וּ <S%H7235><s%> ve-ra-Vu and they shall increase וּפָר֑וּ <S%H6509><s%> u-fa-Ru; and bring fruit וְהוֹשַׁבְתִּ֨י <S%H3427><s%> ve-ho-shav-Ti and I will settle אֶתְכֶ֜ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem כְּקַדְמֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H6927><s%> ke-kad-mo-tei-Chem, you after your old estates וְהֵטִֽבֹתִי֙ <S%H2895><s%> ve-he-ti-vo-Ti and will do better מֵרִאשֹׁ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H7221><s%> me-ri-Sho-tei-Chem, [unto you] than at your beginnings וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> vi-da'-Tem and ye shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. that I [am] the LORD

וְהוֹלַכְתִּי֩ <S%H1980><s%> ve-ho-lach-Ti along עֲלֵיכֶ֨ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem and אָדָ֜ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam Yea I will cause men אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עַמִּ֤י <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mi upon you [even] my people יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel וִֽירֵשׁ֔וּךָ <S%H3423><s%> vi-re-Shu-cha, and they shall possess וְהָיִ֥יתָ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yi-ta you will become לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem לְנַחֲלָ֑ה <S%H5159><s%> le-na-cha-Lah; thee and thou shalt be their inheritance וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not תוֹסִ֥ף <S%H3254><s%> to-Sif and thou shalt no more ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od again לְשַׁכְּלָֽם׃ <S%H7921><s%> le-shak-ke-Lam. henceforth bereave ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an Because אֹמְרִ֣ים <S%H559><s%> 'o-me-Rim Because they say לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, אֹכֶ֥לֶת <S%H398><s%> 'o-Che-let unto you Thou [land] devourest up אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam men; אָתִּי 'at-ti כאָ֑תְּ <S%H859><s%> 'At; you קוּמְשַׁכֶּ֥לֶת <S%H7921><s%> u-me-shak-Ke-let and hast bereaved; גֹּויֵךְ go-yech כגֹּויַ֖יִךְ <S%H1471><s%> go-Ya-yich Gentile קהָיִֽית׃ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yit. become

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, therefore אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam men לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- will no תֹ֣אכְלִי <S%H398><s%> Toch-li Therefore thou shalt devour ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od, longer; וְגֹויֵךְ ve-go-yech כוְגֹויַ֖יִךְ <S%H1471><s%> ve-go-Ya-yich Gentile קלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo and no; תְכַשְּׁלִי־ te-chash-she-li- כתְשַׁכְּלִי־ <S%H3782><s%> te-shak-ke-li- bereave ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od; longer קנְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um any more saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh. GOD

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor אַשְׁמִ֨יעַ <S%H8085><s%> 'ash-Mi-a' Neither will I cause [men] to hear אֵלַ֤יִךְ <S%H413><s%> 'e-La-yich about עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> 'Od anymore כְּלִמַּ֣ת <S%H3639><s%> ke-lim-Mat in thee the shame הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim, of the heathen וְחֶרְפַּ֥ת <S%H2781><s%> ve-cher-Pat the reproach עַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim of the people לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor תִשְׂאִי־ <S%H5375><s%> tis-'i- any more neither shalt thou bear ע֑וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od; any; וְגֹויֵךְ ve-go-yech כוְגֹויַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H1471><s%> ve-go-Ya-yich the nations קלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor תַכְשִׁ֣לִי <S%H3782><s%> tach-Shi-li to fall ע֔וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od, longer נְאֻ֖ם <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um any more saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh.
